attributes.action: Allow International Flights for Emegrency reasons aswell.
attributes.additional_details: We want the governments to allow people to fly out for emergency reasons.
attributes.background: People should be allowed to travel abroad especially when you have family members who have an expected date to pass away, and people who extreme circumstances needing to visiting people abroad.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow International Travel during lockdown.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558124
